title: Sinopia BFF Resource Template Schema
description: A Resource Template construct (or hash) describes one of the various Sinopia entities (Works, Instances, Agent, etc.) associated with a given entity type and set of properties asserted against the entity.

adherence.title: Adherence
adherence.description: The standards or rules that this resource template adheres to.

author.title: Author
author.description: Contact information associated with the resource template.

date.title: Date
date.description: Date associated with the resource template.

description.title: Description
description.description: Textual description associated with the resource template.
example: Metadata for a BIBFRAME Work Abstract entity.

id.title: Resource Template Identifier
id.description: Identifier associated with a resource template. Eventually, a URI.

remark.title: Remark
remark.description: Comment or guiding statement intended to be presented as supplementary information in user display.

resourceLabel.title: Resource Label
resourceLabel.description: Localized label associated with the class.

resourceURI.title: Resource URI
resourceURI.description: URI of the RDF resource type associated with the entity managed by this Resource Template.

source.title: Source URL
source.description: URL or URI that for the resource template in the owner's source repository or space.

title.title: Title
title.description: Textual title associated with the resource template.
